body_html:
Here is the output:

$ grep "_GLIBCXX_USE_C99" /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/4.8/bits/c++config.h
/* #undef _GLIBCXX_USE_C99 */
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_COMPLEX 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_COMPLEX_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_CTYPE_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_FENV_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_INTTYPES_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_INTTYPES_WCHAR_T_TR1 1
/* #undef _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH */
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_STDINT_TR1 1

$ apt-cache showpkg libstdc++-4.8-dev
Package: libstdc++-4.8-dev
Versions: 
4.8.5-4ubuntu6 (/var/lib/apt/lists/gb.archive.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_artful_universe_binary-amd64_Packages) (/var/lib/dpkg/status)
 Description Language:

 Description Language:

 Description Language: en

                  MD5: a197f2aec835e5fc6f8f76039d8a7c4e


Reverse Depends: 
  g++-4.8,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libx32stdc++6-4.8-dbg,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libx32stdc++-4.8-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libstdc++6-4.8-dbg,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6

  libboost1.63-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev

  lib32stdc++-4.8-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libboost1.62-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev
Dependencies: 
4.8.5-4ubuntu6 - gcc-4.8-base (5 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libgcc-4.8-dev (5 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libstdc++6 (2 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libc6-dev (2 2.13-0ubuntu6) libg++2.8-dev (0 (null)) libg++27-dev (0 (null)) libg++272-dev (3 2.7.2.8-1) libstdc++2.10-dev (3 1:2.95.3-2) libstdc++2.8-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++2.9-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++2.9-glibc2.1-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++3.0-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++-4.8-doc (0 (null)) libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386 (35 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386 (38 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) 
Provides: 
4.8.5-4ubuntu6 - libstdc++-dev (= ) 
Reverse Provides:

Edit: I managed to get it to compile by defining the following in c++config.h:
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH 1

Thanks @sdmonov!
body_text:
Here is the output:
$ grep "_GLIBCXX_USE_C99" /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/4.8/bits/c++config.h
/* #undef _GLIBCXX_USE_C99 */
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_COMPLEX 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_COMPLEX_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_CTYPE_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_FENV_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_INTTYPES_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_INTTYPES_WCHAR_T_TR1 1
/* #undef _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH */
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH_TR1 1

body:
Here is the output:

```
$ grep "_GLIBCXX_USE_C99" /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/4.8/bits/c++config.h
/* #undef _GLIBCXX_USE_C99 */
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_COMPLEX 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_COMPLEX_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_CTYPE_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_FENV_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_INTTYPES_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_INTTYPES_WCHAR_T_TR1 1
/* #undef _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH */
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH_TR1 1
#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_STDINT_TR1 1
```

```
$ apt-cache showpkg libstdc++-4.8-dev
Package: libstdc++-4.8-dev
Versions: 
4.8.5-4ubuntu6 (/var/lib/apt/lists/gb.archive.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_artful_universe_binary-amd64_Packages) (/var/lib/dpkg/status)

                  MD5: a197f2aec835e5fc6f8f76039d8a7c4e


Reverse Depends: 
  g++-4.8,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libx32stdc++6-4.8-dbg,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libx32stdc++-4.8-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libstdc++6-4.8-dbg,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libstdc++-4.8-pic,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libboost1.63-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev
  lib32stdc++6-4.8-dbg,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  lib32stdc++-4.8-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev 4.8.5-4ubuntu6
  libboost1.62-dev,libstdc++-4.8-dev
Dependencies: 
4.8.5-4ubuntu6 - gcc-4.8-base (5 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libgcc-4.8-dev (5 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libstdc++6 (2 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libc6-dev (2 2.13-0ubuntu6) libg++2.8-dev (0 (null)) libg++27-dev (0 (null)) libg++272-dev (3 2.7.2.8-1) libstdc++2.10-dev (3 1:2.95.3-2) libstdc++2.8-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++2.9-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++2.9-glibc2.1-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++3.0-dev (0 (null)) libstdc++-4.8-doc (0 (null)) libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386 (35 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) libstdc++-4.8-dev:i386 (38 4.8.5-4ubuntu6) 
Provides: 
4.8.5-4ubuntu6 - libstdc++-dev (= )

```

---

Edit: I managed to get it to compile by defining the following in `c++config.h`:
`#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99 1`
`#define _GLIBCXX_USE_C99_MATH 1`

Thanks @sdmonov!
